title: Looking for information on the types Mainorm and Block from Berthold
content:
Hi everybody,

I am looking for information on the types Mainorm and Block from Berthold.  
The only information I can find about Block is "file magazine", the year and the designer.  
About Mainorm I just found the year and the designer.

I would like to find a critique or a list of companies using the types.

Can anybody help with more experience?  
Thank you!
author: pixelpam

comments.content:
Maireder's site is here: [http://www.maireder.at/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131031725/http:/www.maireder.at/ "http://www.maireder.at/")  
He used his font Mainorm (among others?) for this company:  
 [http://www.maireder.at/Funkberater.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131031725/http:/www.maireder.at/Funkberater.html "http://www.maireder.at/Funkberater.html").  
Can't see it in his other designs.  
Berthold Block is quite ubiquitious.  
What do you need that information for?

In 1995, Design Austria published a four pages leaflet (size A4, in German) called 'Schriften oesterreichscher Designer 02. Karlheinz Maireder â€“ Mainorm (Funkberater)'. You can order it at Design Austria:  
service[at]designaustria.at

THANK YOU!

I always like to know something about a type before I buy it or recommend it for a logo design. The history and former usage is very interesting to know, but sometimes there is not so much information on the internet.

So I thank you very much for your help.
